policy.title: Privacy Policy and Processing of Users' Personal Data on the Qvrix Website
policy.intro: The Qvrix Operator pays special attention to protecting your privacy. We strive to ensure transparency and security regarding any information you provide to us while using the website https://qvrix.com (hereinafter referred to as the 'Site'), as well as its services, programs, and related services. This Privacy Policy governs the processing of personal data carried out by Eldar Memetov, a self-employed individual registered in Germany, operating under the trade name Qvrix (hereinafter referred to as the 'Operator'). By using the Site's services, the User gives their unconditional consent to the provisions of this Policy. If you do not agree with it, please refrain from using the Site.

sections.title: 1. General Provisions
sections.description: We use Cloudflare services to ensure the security and performance of our site. Cloudflare is certified under the EU-U.S. Data Privacy Framework and the UK Extension to the EU-U.S. DPF, confirming its compliance with GDPR requirements for processing personal data in Europe.

subsections.title: 1.1. The term 'User's personal information' in this Policy refers to
points: Data that the User voluntarily provides about themselves when filling out forms, applications, subscribing to updates, or using services. This may include name, email address, phone number, etc. Mandatory fields are marked accordingly.
1.1.2 Data that is automatically transmitted to the Site during its use: IP address, cookies, browser type, language, device technical specifications, access time, request URLs, etc.
1.1.3 Other information, the processing of which is provided for by the terms of the Site Usage Agreement.
1.1.4 This Policy applies exclusively to the Site. The Operator is not responsible for third-party sites that the User may access via links from the Site.

sections.title: 2. Purposes of Processing Personal Data
points: Providing the services you request and responding to inquiries.
Personalizing the user experience.
Improving service quality and developing new products.
Informing about our products, services, promotions, events.
We do not sell, exchange, or transfer your personal data to third parties without your consent, except as expressly provided by applicable law.

sections.title: 3. Rights and Obligations of the Operator

subsections.title: 3.1. The Operator has the right to
points: Receive accurate information and/or documents containing personal data.
In case of withdrawal of the User's consent — continue processing data if permitted by law.
Independently determine the list of measures necessary to ensure compliance with legal requirements regarding personal data.

subsections.title: 3.2. The Operator is obliged to
points: Provide the User with information regarding the processing of their personal data upon request.
Process personal data in accordance with applicable law.
Respond to inquiries and requests from personal data subjects.
Provide necessary information to authorized bodies within their powers.
Ensure public access to this Privacy Policy.
Take technical, organizational, and legal measures to protect personal data from unauthorized access or loss.

sections.title: 4. Principles of Personal Data Processing
points: 4.1 Personal data processing is carried out solely on legal grounds.
4.2 Only personal data that correspond to the stated purposes are processed.
4.3 The scope and nature of the processed data correspond to the stated purposes.
4.4 Accuracy, relevance, and sufficiency of personal data are ensured to achieve processing purposes.
4.5 Personal data are stored no longer than necessary to fulfill processing purposes.
4.6 After achieving processing purposes, personal data may be destroyed or anonymized.

sections.title: 5. Procedure for Collecting, Storing, Transferring, and Other Types of Personal Data Processing
points: 5.1 To ensure a high level of security and performance, we use Cloudflare services certified under the EU-U.S. Data Privacy Framework and the UK Extension to the EU-U.S. DPF.
5.2 The Operator takes all possible measures to protect personal data from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
5.3 Users' personal data are not transferred to third parties without your consent, except as provided by law or to fulfill contractual obligations.

5.4 In case of inaccuracies in personal data, the User has the right to update them by sending a corresponding request to the email address: qvrix.studio@gmail.com with the subject 'Personal Data Update'.
5.5 The User may withdraw consent to the processing of personal data at any time by sending a request to the email: qvrix.studio@gmail.com.
5.6 Personal data processing ceases after achieving the purposes, withdrawal of consent, or in case of unlawful processing.

sections.title: 6. Actions with Received Personal Data
points: The operator collects, records, systematizes, stores, updates, uses, transfers, anonymizes, blocks, deletes, and destroys personal data in accordance with the law.
6.1 Data collected through the feedback form is used exclusively to respond to the User’s request and is not shared with third parties.
6.2 User reviews may be published on the Website only after obtaining explicit consent from the user, which is given when filling out the respective form.

sections.title: 7. Confidentiality of Personal Data
points: 7.1 Modern technical and organizational means are used to protect Users' personal data, including Cloudflare services with appropriate certifications.
7.2 The Operator and persons who have access to personal data are obliged not to disclose or distribute this data without the User's consent, except as provided by law.
7.3 The User may contact for explanations regarding the processing of their personal data by writing to the email address: qvrix.studio@gmail.com.

sections.title: 8. Use of Cookies
points: 8.1 The website uses only necessary cookies that ensure its functionality, security, and performance.
8.2 We do not use cookies to track user behavior for advertising or marketing purposes.
8.3 Users can restrict or disable cookie storage in their browser, but this may affect the functionality of certain website features.
